product.name: Battery Operated Wall Sconces Set Of Two, Wireless Battery Wall Light With 10000mAh RGB Rechargeable Magnetic Bulb, Rechargeable Wall Sconce With Remote Control For Bedroom, No Electrician Required
product.description:
Battery operated wall sconce with 10000mAh RGB rechargeable magnetic bulb, large-capacity battery lighting time up to 20-60 hours.
Magnets replace the screws in the light bulb socket, eliminating the need for tedious screwing and unscrewing of the light bulb.
Rechargeable wall sconces are wireless, allowing you to place them wherever you need them without the constraints of electrical outlets.
product.bullet_points:
• Wireless wall sconces set of two: The battery wall sconce is easy to assemble and install, no wiring and electrician required, allowing you to place them wherever you need them without the constraints of electrical outlets, ideal for old houses, rentals or any dark corners that need lighting. Most importantly, it can provide reliable illumination without interruption during power outages.
• 10000 mAh Rechargeable Magnetic Bulb, Long Life: These battery operated white fabric shade wall sconces provide perfect indoor lighting with rechargeable RGB dimmable bulbs. Built-in magnets at the bottom of the bulb, easy to remove and charge. With USB charging port, no disposable batteries required. The long-lasting battery provides up to 20-60 hours of use time on a single charge, save you high electricity bills and the hassle of frequently changing bulbs.
• Versatile RGB Dimmable Ambience Light: In addition to 3 color temperatures, these battery operated wall lights offer a variety of color options to suit your mood or decor. With 7 color RGB settings, you can choose from a variety of shades to create the perfect atmosphere for any occasion. 5 levels of brightness are adjustable to perfectly meet your various needs.
• sconces wall lighting battery operated with Remote Control: Rechargeable wall sconces can be controlled by touch, and come with a full-featured remote control, which can be used to operate the light. On/off, brightness, color, etc., making it more convenient for you to adjust the lighting from anywhere in the room, increasing their practicality.
• Wide Application of Indoor Wall Lights: If you want decorative lighting but don't have a wall socket, our battery powered wall sconces are a great choice. The wall lights require no wiring, you do not have to find electrical wires or worrying about where the plugs are, so they can be installed almost anywhere, adding a touch of elegance to your bedroom, living room, or any other area that needs ambient lighting, perfect for old houses, apartments, renters.
